plot: A post apocalyptic tale of a lone warrior who must infiltrate the very gang that nearly killed him to obtain the key materials needed for a scientist's special device that can save what's left of mankind before it is too late.
title: There Was to Be Peace
plot_es: A post apocalyptic tale of a lone warrior who must infiltrate the very gang that nearly killed him to obtain the key materials needed for a scientist's special device that can save what's left of mankind before it is too late.
plot_en: A post apocalyptic tale of a lone warrior who must infiltrate the very gang that nearly killed him to obtain the key materials needed for a scientist's special device that can save what's left of mankind before it is too late.
